title: Reality
writer: Matteo Garrone (story), Massimo Gaudioso (story), Ugo Chiti (screenplay), Maurizio Braucci (screenplay), Matteo Garrone (screenplay), Massimo Gaudioso (screenplay)
actors: Aniello Arena, Loredana Simioli, Nando Paone, Nello Iorio
plot: Luciano is a charming fishmonger whose unexpected and sudden obsession with being a contestant on a reality show leads him down a rabbit hole of skewed perceptions and paranoia.
